display_long_description:
# 🪐 In a world where gravity is no longer a limitation, the Gravity League has become the ultimate test of skill and endurance for athletes from all corners of the galaxy 

**🏅 The rules are simple: 2 players, 1 ball, zero gravity - the first player to 11 goals wins**

[media]

**🤺 Compete in the Online League against opponents from across the galaxy!**

[media]

**🏆 Climb to the top league in the epic Solo Campaign!**

[media]

**😮 Face off against legendary bosses in the Gravity Hall of Fame!**

[media]

**🤜🤛 Challenge your friends in exciting custom private matches!**

[media]

**🥳 Dive into our wild and wacky party modes!**

[media]

**🎁 Play minigames and score epic prizes!**

[media]

**✊✊ Team up with your friends for a 2v2 action**

[media]

**Main Features:**

Online League – Compete in ranked or unranked matches and prove your skills
Solo Campaign – Climb from the Regional League to the top of the Gravity League.
Party Modes – Challenge friends in four fun and chaotic game modes
Solo Mode – Take on Grax across multiple AI difficulty levels
Ranking System – Level up to 100 and unlock exciting rewards along the way
Vibrant Discord Community – Join the server for secret challenges, tournaments, and to connect with other players
Minigames – Play for a chance to win awesome prizes in Gravity's mini-games

**It’s time to strap on your Gravity Gloves and get ready to take on the competition!** 🫡
